headline.main: GERMANS RETREAT IN SMOLENSK ZONE; Berlin Says Forces Fall Back to More Favorable Positions Under Soviet Attacks

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Saturday, July 3 (U.P.) -- A Berlin broadcast reported today that German forces had retreated to a new defense line in the Dorogobuzh sector, fifty miles east of Smolensk, under the impact of repeated Russian attacks.
abstract: USSR repts raids on Kerch, Taman and Sennaya, Kuban front
snippet: LONDON, Saturday, July 3 (U.P.) -- A Berlin broadcast reported today that German forces had retreated to a new defense line in the Dorogobuzh sector, fifty miles east of Smolensk, under the impact of repeated Russian attacks....
